title: Improve text visibility and contrast

requirements.text: Update text colors throughout the application to ensure optimal contrast and readability, particularly for text overlays on background images (hero section, contact section, product cards)

quotes: just change the text to best visibility

acceptanceCriteria: All text elements have sufficient contrast ratio (WCAG AA minimum 4.5:1 for normal text, 3:1 for large text)
Text on image backgrounds is clearly readable without strain
Color adjustments maintain the existing design aesthetic
Text remains visible in both light and dark conditions

requirements.text: Review and enhance text styling in the HeroSection component where text appears over the furnace background image, ensuring the gradient overlay provides sufficient contrast for white text
acceptanceCriteria: Hero section heading and subheading are clearly visible against the background
Gradient overlay is adjusted if needed to improve text legibility

requirements.text: Enhance text visibility in the ContactSection component where the WhatsApp contact information appears over the refinery interior background image
acceptanceCriteria: Contact card text is easily readable
Phone number and WhatsApp button have strong contrast against the background

requirements.text: Improve text contrast in ProductCard components, especially for product titles and purity badge text
acceptanceCriteria: Badge text for purity levels has sufficient contrast

requirements.text: Review and optimize text colors in the LiveRatesDashboard to ensure price displays, GST breakdown, and percentage changes are easily readable
acceptanceCriteria: Positive/negative percentage changes have clear visual distinction

constraints: Maintain the existing OKLCH color system defined in the Tailwind configuration
Preserve the metallic gold/silver theme and visual identity
Do not modify the backend/main.mo file
Keep the existing layout and component structure intact
nonGoals: Redesigning the overall layout or component structure
Changing the color scheme or brand identity
